java112.labs1

Class UseBufferedReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.labs1.UseBufferedReader

  • public class UseBufferedReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class demonstrates the BufferedReader class.
    Author:
    eknapp

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.BufferedReader input
      This is the BufferedReader object that will allow us to read in the file.
      private java.util.List tokens
      This ArrayList will keep track of all the tokens in the order that they are read from the file.
      private java.util.Set uniqueTokens
      This HashSet will hold all the unique tokens in the input file.

      This method prints the uniqueTokens

    • Field Detail

      • input

        private java.io.BufferedReader input
        This is the BufferedReader object that will allow us to read in the file.

      • tokens

        private java.util.List tokens
        This ArrayList will keep track of all the tokens in the order that they are read from the file. Duplicates are allowed.

      • uniqueTokens

        private java.util.Set uniqueTokens
        This HashSet will hold all the unique tokens in the input file. There is no need to do anything special to reject duplicates, this is done automatically.

        This method prints the tokens

        private void printUniqueTokenList()
        This method prints the uniqueTokens

                 throws java.io.IOException
